text: Ramganj Belgachhi is a village development committee in Sunsari District in the Kosi Zone of south-eastern Nepal. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census it had a population of 5502 people living in 1005 individual households. ==References== Ramganj Belgachhiya Village Development Committee (VDC) is going to be declared as an ODF (Open Defecation Free) VDC on Monday 10:30 a.m. 14 July 2014. The V-WASH-CC (Village Water, Sanitation and Hygiene Committee) is going to organize this program at the field of Shree Nawadurga High School. Category:Populated places in Sunsari District
title: Ramganj Belgachhi
